# Reporting & Dashboards

**Context:** Loaded when user requests test reporting or dashboard design.

## Agents in This Category

- **[Reporting Designer](agent-prompt.md)** - Designs test reports, dashboards, and metrics visualization

## When to Load This Agent

```
#file .github/agents/reporting-designer/agent-prompt.md
```

**Tip:** See `agent-prompt.md` for Allure, HTML reports, and custom dashboard templates.
